article.Heading: GST Council likely to meet today: Sources
article.Summary: Sources say that the goods and services tax (GST) Council is likely to meet today to consider issue regarding cess on tobacco. Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18's Timsy Jaipuria for more details.
article.Body:
Sources say that the goods and services tax (GST) Council is likely to meet today to consider issue regarding cess on tobacco.

Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18's Timsy Jaipuria for more details.
